SELECT COUNT(*) FROM keep WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT keep.project_code, keep.email, project_story.project_title, project_story.representative_picture, project_story.project_content, project_list.project_date, project_info.representative_name FROM keep INNER JOIN project_story ON keep.project_code = project_story.project_code INNER JOIN project_list ON keep.project_code = project_list.project_code INNER JOIN project_info ON keep.project_code = project_info.project_code WHERE keep.email = #{email} ORDER BY project_list.project_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow} ,#{listLimit}
